text: yesterday at 6:00 a.m. FBI agents
entered a New York City Apartment
inhabited by a shaggy-haired 26-year-old
crypt bro named Shane Copeland and raid
his
home the feds are not too happy with him
right now because he runs a website
called poly Market that allows users to
buy Futures contracts about the outcome
of world events like will the US
confirmed aliens exist will there be a
monkey pox pandemic is Taylor Swift
pregnant and who will win the 2024
presidential election it sounds like a
cool website the only problem is that
it's still very illegal in the United
States contrary to popular belief this
is not a free country where you can just
place bets in unregulated markets the
poly Market doesn't actually offer
services to us customers but it was
still highly influential and highly
accurate in the 2024 election and that
has the mainstream media and their
pollster seating because it was supposed
to be a historically tight race so so so
tight the company made the following
statement this is obviously political
retribution by the outgoing
Administration against poly Market
before providing a market that correctly
called a 2024 presidential election but
there's a lot more to the story and in
today's video we'll try to figure out
why the feds are going after poly Market
it is November 14th 2024 and you
watching the code report the first thing
we need to understand is how websites
like poly Market work it's not the only
player in this game Robin Hood also let
you invest in the future outcome of the
election but its biggest rival is Ki
which actually got regulatory approval
for us customers to make Wagers but
these companies don't work like a Vegas
sports book where a central odds maker
sets two sides of a bet to profit on the
spread between them instead poly Market
Works more like derivatives or stock
options in financial markets the actual
odds are determined on a continuous
basis as money flows into each side of
the trade if more money flows into red
the odds go up and the potential payout
goes down and vice versa then users can
buy and sell shares to profit or lose
money on the outcome this results in a
real-time stream of what people actually
believe will happen in the future it's a
perfectly efficient free market at least
in theory when it to the 2024
presidential election it handled over
3.6 billion in trading volume what's
unique about poly Market is that all
bets are settled using smart contracts
via polygon which is a sublayer of the
ethereum network it's actually one of
the few web 3 applications that
delivered on all the hype from a few
years ago however in investigation by
Fortune Magazine it found that about
onethird of the trading volume showed
signs of Market manipulation where
shares were bought and sold
simultaneously to pump up the actual
trading volume in addition when they
investigated the actual blockchain they
found a mismatch between a reported
volume of 2.7 billion and actual onchain
activity only representing 1.75 billion
but the beauty of crypto is that we can
audit all this stuff in public
furthermore in January 2022 poly Market
was finded 1.4 Million by the commodity
Futures Trading commission for a variety
of violations like failing to register
as a swap execution facility at the end
of the day though if you wanted to know
the outcome of the election in advance
the poly Market was a much better guide
than the mainstream media the company
itself is raised over $70 million and is
backed by Peter theal and even has Mark
cubin as an investor who also said their
election odds were worthless although he
may have been under the influence of
copium one thing's for sure though the
crypto markets love the outcome of this
election Bitcoin just eclipsed $90,000
and now that Elon is in charge of the
Department of government efficiency the
likelihood of any new harmful crypto
regulation is extremely low and Trump is
even pledged to Pardon crypto Bros like
Ross rri who have been thrown in prison
for life in fact you can even buy shares
on poing market for that event but now
that brings us to the question why was
Shane Copeland rated They seized all of
his electronic devices and I would
speculate the feds are looking for
evidence that he was complicit in
letting us citizens break laws like
betting on poly Market but if he was
also actively encouraging it then he
could be in major trouble like maybe
they open up Telegram and find a message
to his grandma that tells her how to use
a VPN then create a crypto wallet then
buy usdc then transfer it to your
Anonymous wallet then transfer it to
poly Market to make illegal Investments
on his website that would be bad but I'm
not implying him or his grandma of any
wrongdoing but another theory on the
Internet is that he's being arrested for
erection interference all the other
betting markets had similar odds but the
reason the feds might hate poly Market
is for one that it's a crypto community
and two it's backed by Peter theal at
one time he was an FBI informant but
he's a huge fan of JD Vance and help
bankroll his career whether it's actual
political retribution or not we may
never know but just hours ago after they
finished water boarding him Shane
copelan immediately took to Twitter and
clearly stated that this was a Las ditch

to be associated with political
opponents this has been the code report
